definition: pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]
to record/to note/to memorize/to remember/mark/sign/classifier for blows, kicks, shots
root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc

pinyin: bi3 ji4 ben3 ji4 suan4 ji1

sentences.english: All laptops in our shop are brand new and authentic.
sentences.chinese: 本店所售筆記本電腦均爲全新正品行貨。

sentences.english: The main purpose of the notebook is to help you prepare a weekly study schedule.
sentences.chinese: 這個筆記本的主要用途是幫你準備一週學習計劃。

sentences.english: He transcribed two paragraphs from the book into his notebook.
sentences.chinese: 他把書中的兩段抄在筆記本上。

sentences.english: They manufacture paper supplies, notebooks, and Trapper Keepers, among other things.
sentences.chinese: 他們製造紙張，筆記本，夾子和其他許多文具。

sentences.english: What do you think of the keyboard on this laptop?
sentences.chinese: 你覺得這種筆記本電腦的鍵盤怎麼樣？

sentences.english: He says the special laptop is an example of appropriate technology.
sentences.chinese: 他稱特殊的筆記本是“適用技術”的一個典型。

sentences.english: Don’t panic, I’m talking about just 15 minutes per day when your notebook reigns.
sentences.chinese: 別難過，我說的是每天用15分鐘讓筆記本做主。

sentences.english: Please take yours to get your note-books.
sentences.chinese: 請按順序取走你們的筆記本。

sentences.english: When she was young , she used to store quotations from poems in a notebook.
sentences.chinese: 他年輕時，常常在筆記本里記下一些摘引詩歌的內容。

sentences.english: Intubated, when he couldn’t talk, he asked for a notepad.
sentences.chinese: 他不能說話時，要了一個筆記本。

sentences.english: Would you like to demonstrate that feature on your laptop?
sentences.chinese: 您願意在自己的筆記本上演示此特性嗎？

sentences.english: I folded my notepaper and headed for the library.
sentences.chinese: 我摺疊起筆記本，往圖書館走去。

sentences.english: Slide access notebook compartment is lined in faux fur for optimum protection.
sentences.chinese: 幻燈片訪問筆記本車廂兩旁是人造毛皮最佳的保護。

sentences.english: You may set your Data-cal when you handsel it.
sentences.chinese: 初次使用電子筆記本時，你得進行初使調定。

sentences.english: NIKKY: both, but now I am using the notebook.
sentences.chinese: 我兩個都有，但是現在我在用筆記本電腦。

sentences.english: This is right out of his notebook.

definition: It is said that ... (at the start of a narrative)/to discuss/to recount
to (carry) on one's person/to (take) with one
easily/without trouble/while one is at it/in passing/handy
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
